mapper.select: select id, isUsed, create_time, update_time, remarks, a_name, a_synopsis, a_status, a_type, a_award from auth_task where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into auth_task(isUsed, create_time, update_time, remarks, a_name, a_synopsis, a_status, a_type, a_award) values (#{isused}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{remarks}, #{aName}, #{aSynopsis}, #{aStatus}, #{aType}, #{aAward})

insert into auth_task(isUsed, create_time, update_time, remarks, a_name, a_synopsis, a_status, a_type, a_award) values
(#{entity.isused}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.remarks}, #{entity.aName}, #{entity.aSynopsis}, #{entity.aStatus}, #{entity.aType}, #{entity.aAward})

insert into auth_task(isUsed, create_time, update_time, remarks, a_name, a_synopsis, a_status, a_type, a_award) values
(#{entity.isused}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.remarks}, #{entity.aName}, #{entity.aSynopsis}, #{entity.aStatus}, #{entity.aType}, #{entity.aAward})
on duplicate key update isUsed = values(isUsed), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time), remarks = values(remarks), a_name = values(a_name), a_synopsis = values(a_synopsis), a_status = values(a_status), a_type = values(a_type), a_award = values(a_award)
mapper.update:
update auth_task
isUsed = #{isused},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
remarks = #{remarks},
a_name = #{aName},
a_synopsis = #{aSynopsis},
a_status = #{aStatus},
a_type = #{aType},
a_award = #{aAward},
where id = #{id}
